channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brain scientists are seeking weight-loss drugs without the nausea
item.description: Weight-loss drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound often cause nausea and other side effects. Brain scientists are looking for ways to solve this problem.

item.title: Are there lessons for the U.S. in this European country's struggle with measles?

item.title: Can vaping help wean people off cigarettes? Anti-smoking advocates are sharply split

item.title: We’re in a “Buyer’s Market”…But Where Are the Real Estate Deals? (Rookie Reply)

item.title: SpaceX’s upgraded Starship suffers explosion during testing
item.description: It may not have been a massive fireball, but SpaceX now has more work to do before it can kick off this next-generation version of Starship.

item.title: The European startup market is ready for the limelight
item.description: The region's startup market is hungry for its first trillion-dollar startup, and in many ways has set itself up to reach that goal.

item.description: According to Grok, Elon Musk can out-slug the MLB's greatest power hitters... except Ohtani.
